Introduction
This topic contains information on evaluating musculoskeletal disabilities of the hands, including
identifying digits of the hand
evaluating
amputations of multiple fingers
, and
ankylosis of one or more fingers
compensable evaluations for the fingers
, and
rating Dupuytrenâ€™s contracture of the hand

title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Musculoskeletal Disabilities of the Extremities and Spine
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
